column2:
1. A Requester signals a desire to request a probability of whether or not a patient will abuse opioids.
2. The system provides to the Requester a mechanism to request a probability of whether or not a patient will abuse opioids.
3. The Requester specifies a Patient.
4. The Requester signals that a request with the Patient should be sent.
5. The system sends the request.
6. The system provides to the Requester a probability of whether or not a patient will abuse opioids.
This use case terminates.
